alert.note: Alert for Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:17PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central West Feliciana and north central Pointe Coupee Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 417 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Wakefield, or 12 miles northwest of St. Francisville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central West Feliciana and north central Pointe Coupee Parishes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
